text: I enjoy taking risks in social situations, even if they make me uncomfortable.
I often challenge traditional ways of thinking in group settings.
I feel comfortable speaking out against the majority opinion.
I am more inclined to take risks if I believe they could benefit others.
I often feel energized by uncertainty in social situations.
I am willing to risk social rejection to stay true to my beliefs.
I value pushing boundaries in social norms to encourage progress.
I feel uncomfortable breaking social conventions, even for a good reason.
I enjoy introducing controversial topics into discussions.
I am comfortable trying new and unconventional approaches in social situations.
I would rather risk failure than avoid taking a chance in a social setting.
I often experiment with new ways of interacting with others.
I am willing to risk criticism to express my true thoughts.
I see social risks as opportunities for personal growth.
I feel exhilarated by the idea of challenging societal expectations.
I sometimes avoid risks to maintain harmony in social settings.
I believe taking risks in social dynamics is necessary to inspire change.
I find it rewarding to challenge my own comfort zone in social situations.
I believe the potential for growth outweighs the fear of rejection in social settings.
I often inspire others by taking bold steps in social situations.
